nodes.text: Golden Nyss Shipyards was a shipyard that was located near the Yinchorri system.
It catered largely to smugglers, pirates, bounty hunters, and other elements of the galactic fringe. The droid NT 600 was built at these shipyards.

During the Yinchorri Uprising, it was one of the Yinchorri's first targets. First they stole the ships docked there, then they destroyed the station altogether. During this time, Golden Nyss was run by Shipyard Master Gzin.
